text: 4:7 Aisaia 26:3; Jon 14:27; Rom 5:1; Kolosi 3:15Eghtɨ kamaghɨn God ia damutɨ ia navir amɨrizimɨn ikiam. Egh ia Krais Iesus ko porogh deragh ikiam, eghtɨ tuavir kamɨn Godɨn navir amɨrizim deravɨra ian naviba ko nɨghnɨzibagh eghuvtɨ da bar deravɨra ikiam. God navir amɨrizir e ganɨngizir kam, a bar bizir aghuim, ezɨ navir amɨrizir kam gumazibar fofozim bar a gafira.
